articles.title: Preparing for future AI risks in biology
articles.titleJa: Preparing のための将来の AI risks でbiology
articles.summary: Advanced AI can transform biology and medicine—but also raises biosecurity risks. We’re proactively assessing capabilities and implementing safeguards to prevent misuse.
articles.summaryJa: 高度な AI can 変革 biology とmedicine—しかし また raises biosecurity risks. We’re proactively assessing capabilities とimplementing safeguards にprevent misuse.
